name: CharacterData.nextElementSibling
description: The NonDocumentTypeChildNode.nextElementSibling read-only property returns the element immediately following the specified one in its parent's children list, or null if the specified element is the last one in the list.

refs.name: Element Traversal Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'ElementTraversal.nextElementSibling' in Element Traversal Specification.
